text:
Never, the drop for this pool was in the spring and everyone has already received it to their SOL wallets. If you contributed funds to the pool after the snapshot date, you will not receive the drop.

Now you can only withdraw your funds from the completed pools and wait for news about the next ones.
Greetings; When will the airdrop amount and withdrawal button be activated?
Unstacking works well, try to reconnect the wallet.
